item.title: Four Brother Sheep - Children's Book
item.description: Four Brother Sheep Embark on a captivating adventure with the "Four Brother Sheep" as they learn valuable life lessons about the importance of obeying their parents. This enchanting tale follows the misadventures of four sheep siblings - Selfish, Stubborn, Pride, and Prudence - as they explore the world around them, discovering the consequences of not heeding their parents' advice. When danger lurks and their brothers are in peril, can the youngest and wisest sheep, Prudence, save the day by making the right choices?
